author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes unnecessary `#include`s of legacy EDModule headers plus some more of framework headers (that were clearly unused). These `#include`s were identified as part of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37592. The first commit moves one `kNull` object from global to anonymous namespace that I spotted along the way.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.
title: [DQM] Remove some unnecessary framework includes
